Content.Text:
The number of times you
have cooked. The same
recipe cooked more than
once still counts.

The number of fish you've
caught with a rod. Fish 
trapped and non-fish 
don't count.

The number of fish you've
caught in fish traps. Fish
caught with a rod and 
non-fish don't count.

The number of critters you
have caught.

The number of amenities
you have made. Making the
same amenity more than
once still counts.

The total amount of money
you have made by shipping.
Shows how successful a
farmer you are.

How many blueprints you
have acquired. There are
many to acquire; getting a
complete set is not easy.

How many cooking recipes
you have acquired. There
are many; getting a
complete set is not easy.

The number of different
types of crops you've
harvested. Have you grown
all the crops there are?

The number of different
types of fish you've
caught. Some types of fish
are hard to catch!

The number of different
types of critters you have
caught. Some types of
critters are hard to find!

The number of town
restoration projects
you have done for Dunhill.
Measures your abilities!

The number of gifts you've
given to the Harvest
Goddess...whether she
liked them or not.

The number of trips you
have taken. Trips to the
Animal Sanctuary are not
counted.

The number of times you
used the Memory Museum.

The number of outfits you
own.

The number of times you've
changed your hairstyle.
Hairstyles worn more than
once still count.

Number of items exchanged
at Sandra's Stall.

The number of times you
won the Crop Festival.
Any category and class
counts!

The number of times you
won the Cooking Festival.
Any category and class
counts!

The number of times you
won the Beekeeping
Festival.
Any class counts!

The number of times you
won the Cow Festival.
Any class counts!

The number of times you
won the Chicken Festival.
Any class counts!

The number of times you
won the Sheep Festival.
Any class counts!

The number of times you
won the Alpaca Festival.
Any class counts!

The number of times you
won the Llama Festival.
Any class counts!

The number of times you
won the Yak Festival.
Any class counts!

The number of times you
won the Fishing Contest.

The number of times you
won the Critter Contest.

The number of times you
raised giant animals. If
this number is big, you're
great at raising animals!

The number of times you
collected milk from your
cows.

The number of times you
gathered eggs from your
chickens.

The number of times you
collected wool from your
sheep.

The number of times you
collected alpaca wool from
your alpacas.

The number of times you
collected llama wool from
your llamas.

The number of times you
collected yak milk from
your yaks.

The number of cows you
have acquired.
You're a real cow-lover!
Try for a herd of 100!

The number of chickens you
have acquired. You're a
real chicken-lover!
Try for a flock of 100!

The number of sheep you
have acquired.
You're a real sheep fan!
Try for a flock of 100!

The number of alpacas you
have acquired.
You're a real alpaca fan!
Try for a herd of 100!

The number of llamas you
have acquired.
You're a real llama fan!
Try for a herd of 100!

The number of yaks you
have acquired.
You're a real yak fan!
Try for a herd of 100!

The number of times you've
collected honey from your
beehive. There are said to
be three kinds of honey.

The number of times you've
collected mushrooms from
your mushroom log.

The number of giant crops
you have harvested. If the
number is large, you must
be great at growing crops!

The number of vegetables
you have harvested.

The number of fruits you
have harvested.
Includes crops harvested
from orchards.

The number of flowers you
have harvested.

The number of herbs you
have harvested.

The number of fiber crops
you have harvested.

The number of grains you
have harvested.

The number of paddy crops
you have harvested.

The number of tea leaves
you have harvested.

The number of fish you
have raised in your
Fishing Shed. Not counting
ones you stocked into it!

The number of crabs you
have caught.

The number of shrimp you
have caught.

The number of shellfish
you have caught.

The number of mollusks you
have caught.

The number of rare types
of "big game" seafood you
have caught.

The number of butterflies
you have caught.

The number of locusts you
have caught.

The number of cicadas you
have caught.

The number of beetles you
have caught.

The number of stag beetles
you have caught.

The number of dragonflies
you have caught.

The number of fireflies
you have caught.

The number of frogs you
have caught.

The number of bees you
have caught.

The number of ladybugs you
have caught.

The number of times you've
played music.

The number of times you've
played Multiplayer: counts
when you exchanged an item
AND raised animals fully.

The number of times you've
used makers to make items,
no matter how many items
in each batch.

The number of times you've
mined minerals from the
mine. Items besides gems
and minerals don't count.

The number of items you've
foraged from the ground.
Items found in tree stumps
are also counted.

The number of times you've
used a mountain device.

The number of times you've
eaten poison mushrooms.
You are much too curious
if you keep eating them!

The number of times you
have stayed awake until
you fainted. Don't push
yourself so hard!
